process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A transparent 4-step journey to your financial success.
process.step1Desc: We begin by understanding your financial goals, risk appetite, and investment horizon. Whether you're planning for retirement or wealth accumulation, we listen first.
process.step2Desc: Our experts design a tailored portfolio mixing equity, debt, and alternative assets to maximize returns while staying within your risk comfort zone.
process.step3Desc: Once you approve the plan, we execute the investments efficiently. Your capital is deployed across chosen instruments with full transparency.
process.step4Desc: We provide 24/7 dashboard access for you to track performance. We also conduct quarterly reviews to rebalance and optimize your portfolio.
process.diversificationDesc: We never put all your eggs in one basket. We spread investments across asset classes, geographies, and sectors.
process.dueDiligenceDesc: Every investment opportunity undergoes a rigorous 50-point checklist before being presented to you.
process.stopLossDesc: We employ automated triggers to limit downside in volatile market conditions, protecting your principal.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your most common questions.
faq.q1: Is my investment safe with InvestCorp?
faq.a1: Absolutely. We are fully registered with the Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) and adhere to strict financial regulations. All client funds are held in segregated accounts with top-tier custodian banks.
faq.q2: What is the minimum investment amount?
faq.a2: Our Starter plan begins at just $500. For our premium wealth management services and custom portfolios, the minimum investment is $50,000.
faq.q3: How can I withdraw my funds?
faq.a3: Withdrawals can be requested at any time through your online dashboard. Standard processing time is 3-5 business days. Please note that certain fixed-term plans may have lock-in periods.
faq.a4: Returns vary based on the plan and market conditions. Our historical average for the Growth Plan is 12.5% annually. However, past performance is not indicative of future results.
faq.a5: While we provide annual tax reports for your investments, we recommend consulting with a certified tax professional for personalized tax planning and advice.
